#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define sc(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define prt(n) printf("%d ",n)
using namespace std;
int tree[4000001];
int query(int ss,int se,int l,int r,int ind)
{
	if(ss>se||r<ss||se<l)
	return 0;
	if(l<=ss&&r>=se)
	return tree[ind];
	int mid=(ss+se)/2;
	return (query(ss,mid,l,r,2*ind)+query(mid+1,se,l,r,2*ind+1));
}
void update(int ss,int se,int ind,int val)
{
	if(ss>se||val>se||val<ss)
		return ;
	if(ss==se)
	{
		tree[ind]++;
		return ;
	}
	int mid=(ss+se)/2;
	if(val<=mid)
	{
		update(ss,mid,2*ind,val);
	}
	else
	{
		update(mid+1,se,2*ind+1,val);
	}
	tree[ind]=tree[2*ind]+tree[2*ind+1];	
}
int main()
{
	int n,t,ans,x,i;
	//freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sc(n);
		for(i=0;i<4000000;i++)
		tree[i]=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			sc(x);
			ans=query(0,1000000,0,x-1,1);			
			update(0,1000000,1,x);
			cout<<ans<<" ";
		}
		cout<<"\n";
	}
return 0;
}
